name: ghatui
description: Terminal UI for monitoring GitHub Actions on your authored pull requests.

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --target node --outfile dist/gh-actions-tui.js && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const p='dist/gh-actions-tui.js';const shebang='#!/usr/bin/env node\n';const s=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');if(!s.startsWith('#!/usr/bin/env node')) fs.writeFileSync(p,shebang+s);" && chmod +x dist/gh-actions-tui.js
scripts.prepack: bun run build && bun run smoke
